linearState.title: Review Trello connector enablement after Chandler's briefing
linearState.description:
Production promotion in progress for Trello connector enablement.

PR #2223 (open): [https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2223](https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/2223)
Status: Currently in review
Key Trello changes in this promotion:

* New TrelloIncrementalSyncExtractor with action-ID cursor per board; batch refresh/deletes and indexing
* Trello client: added org/board/member actions endpoints and pagination helpers; org boards listing
* Cron job (\*/30): triggers incremental sync for all tenants with active Trello installations
* Webhook extractor narrowed to critical admin lifecycle events; card/board content/movement handled by incremental sync
* Ingest worker registration for source trello_incremental_sync

Note: Promotion aggregates several sub-PRs; continue review of any pending approvals.

linearState.title: Clarify Linear connection + triage onboarding flow; reduce confusion (Heron Data signal)
linearState.description:
Problem
Customers are confused by the Linear connection + triage onboarding flow. Jasmine (Heron Data) encountered unclear states and friction when trying to set up/use triage.

Observed evidence
• Evangeline flagged customer confusion in proj-exponent and investigated the Linear connection + triage onboarding flow
• Customer thread shows confusion around how triage works, ability to edit Linear target, and multi-project constraints
• Team proposed adding a proactive setting to control triage posting behavior and clarifying connect/disconnect states

Why this matters
Confusion during setup blocks adoption and creates support load. Clearer UX and state transitions should increase successful installs and reduce handholding.

Proposed scope (first pass)

1. Clarify Linear OAuth connect/disconnect states (explicit status, confirm/undo, and post-disconnect state)
2. In triage settings, expose a proactive mode toggle:
   • Off: triage silently proposes in thread; user must approve
   • On: triage auto-posts suggested changes with clear undo
3. Channel → Linear team/project mapping UI and clearer copy for multi-project orgs; guidance in-Slack for selecting target per-thread when needed
4. Improve error messaging when token scope is insufficient, with re-auth CTA
5. Add in-product breadcrumbs from Slack thread messages back to the relevant settings pages

Acceptance criteria
• A user can clearly tell whether Linear is connected or disconnected, and what to do next
• In a mapped channel, triage behavior is predictable based on the proactive setting
• Users in multi-project orgs understand how to pick/change the Linear destination
• Insufficient-scope errors present a re-auth path and do not appear as silent failures

Notes / links for context (Slack threads)
• proj-exponent: “we might need to improve the flow here a lil, jasmine from herondata got pretty confused”
• Customer channel: Questions about editing Linear ticket in thread; need for better control over triage behavior

Owner
TBD

linearState.title: Work on admin dashboard changes
linearState.description:
Add team mapping UI for /triage and Slack channel listing endpoint.

PR #1945 (open): [https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/1945](https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/1945)

* Backend (admin-backend): Add GET /api/slack/channels to list bot-accessible channels (public/private) via Slack conversations.list; filters is_member === true; supports pagination via next_cursor; uses per-tenant SLACK_BOT_TOKEN; protected by requireAdmin; includes error handling/logging.
* Frontend (admin-frontend): TriageBotPage adds Linear Team Mappings UI to map Slack channels to Linear teams; fetches Linear teams via OAuth GraphQL (using LINEAR_ACCESS_TOKEN); fetches Slack channels from /api/slack/channels; loads/saves mappings via /api/exponent/admin/linear-team-mappings; supports add/delete rows, validation, dirty-state detection, loading/saving indicators, and success feedback.

linearState.title: Fix Linear OAuth scopes for Slackbot (admin-backend + frontend)
linearState.description:
PR #1944 (open): [https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/1944](https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/1944)
Scope: Linear OAuth write scope and triage bot flow

Backend (admin-backend):

* /api/linear/install supports ?write=true to request read,write scope; accepts redirect param
* OAuth state encodes { tenantId, redirectTo }
* /api/linear/callback decodes state and returns { success, redirectTo }
* If redirectTo === '/triage', persist TRIAGE_BOT_LINEAR_CONNECTED = 'true' and log connection
* /api/linear/disconnect clears TRIAGE_BOT_LINEAR_CONNECTED along with tokens
* Added TRIAGE_BOT_LINEAR_CONNECTED to NON_SENSITIVE_KEYS

Frontend:

* LinearOAuthCallbackPage reads redirectTo from backend response and redirects to /triage or /integrations/linear
* Success copy is dynamic for triage bot vs general integration

linearState.title: Message Max about ask_agent/triage fixes once changes are done
linearState.description:
Fix getting document via MCP for triage/ask_agent flows.

PR #1943 (merged): [https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/1943](https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/1943)

* Introduced callGetDocumentViaMCPInternal to call the get_document MCP tool with proper JSON-RPC payload and SSE parsing
* Generated internal JWT via generateInternalJWT for non-billable internal tool calls
* Added timeout/abort handling and axios retry strategy with robust error logging
* Parsed SSE 'data:' lines to extract JSON; validated result.content and handled MCP errors
* Updated TriageAgentStrategy to call callGetDocumentViaMCP and return response.content (instead of answer)
* Wired import in common and added instrumentation/logging

Status: Merged via Graphite stack

linearState.title: Set Grapevine webhook secret for gather-staging to stop webhook error spam
linearState.description:
Karen reported repeated log spam due to a missing webhook secret for the 'gather-staging' tenant.

* Observed error (2025-11-14T19:53:09.904Z):

```
info: Grapevine webhook {"service":"backend","event":"document.changed","documentId":"C08AWKB4PC4_2025-11-14","source":"slack","tenantId":"878f6fb522b441d1","outcome":"error: Missing Grapevine webhook secret for tenant \"gather-staging\". Set GRAPEVINE_WEBHOOK_SECRET_GATHER_STAGING in your environment."}
```

* Impact: We're getting spammed with this error in logs
* Indicated fix: Set GRAPEVINE_WEBHOOK_SECRET_GATHER_STAGING in the environment for the 'gather-staging' tenant

[View original Slack message](https://slack.com/archives/C09HTTVUSH5/p1763150144870279?thread_ts=1763150144.870279)
